Sentence.value: Enteral feeding is a way to feed your child using a feeding tube.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Enteral feeding is a way to feed your [[child|C0008059]] using a [[feeding tube|C0086337]].

Sentence.value: If your child has diarrhea and cramping: - Make sure the formula is mixed properly and warm.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: If your [[child|C0008059]] has [[diarrhea|C0011991]] and cramping: - Make sure the formula is mixed properly and warm.

Sentence.value: - Check with your provider about antibiotics or other medicines that may be causing it.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Check with your provider about [[antibiotics|C0003232]] or other [[medicines|C0013227]] that may be causing it.

Sentence.value: If your child has an upset stomach or is vomiting: - Make sure the formula is mixed properly and warm.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: If your [[child|C0008059]] has an [[upset stomach|C0235309]] or is vomiting: - Make sure the formula is mixed properly and warm.
